page.title: 10SOME LOCAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: We carried out a survey of the activities that the children in 4R did after school. Among the most popular were attendance at the local{Guides and Scouts groups. They meet once a week, and occasionally , in the summer time there are camping week-ends. Other children went to the local {Sports centre}- particularly during the holidays , when they have special sessions of squash; badminton; football; and trampolining. A lot of children also went to the local{swimming pool; went to judo; {horse-riding; read books from the {local library; gymnastics club; {and clubs associated with the local {churches. Quite a few boys played for local {Abbey Youth Football teams.
